casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Robert Lewis STYLES. No. 494P01-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 4, 2004. Daniel P. O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, James T. Rusher, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th day of February 2004 by Defendant to Amend Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of March 2004."
